item.title: About
item.description: Sebastian Ymai Born in Santiago, Chile Spent the past 7 years in and out of the Glasgow School of Art until summer 2016 Musical endeavours…
item.content:encoded:
Sebastian Ymai

Born in Santiago, Chile Spent the past 7 years in and out of the Glasgow School of Art until summer 2016

Musical endeavours:

anxietyglasgow.bandcamp.com caroubalo.bandcamp.com pennycress.bandcamp.com rowangrows.bandcamp.com flaccidflute.bandcamp.com flaccidfathers.bandcamp.com

sebastian.y.r.varas@gmail.com

item.title: Home
item.description: Currently Triangle France-Asterides Artist Residency Exchange September — December 2019 in Marseille. In association with Glasgow Sculpture…
item.content:encoded:
Currently

  • Triangle France-Asterides Artist Residency Exchange September — December 2019 in Marseille. In association with Glasgow Sculpture Studios.
  • Talbot Rice Resident Artist 2019-2021 in association with ECA at the University of Edinburgh
  • Creative LAB residency, CCA Glasgow, Feb 2020.

item.title: 2ply
item.description: GLASGOW BASED BAND 2ply are Mark Briggs (bass/vocals) and Eothen Stearn (drums/vocals). Formed from the perils of 2017 they are a mixture of…
item.content:encoded: GLASGOW BASED BAND 2ply are Mark Briggs (bass/vocals) and Eothen Stearn (drums/vocals). Formed from the perils of 2017 they are a mixture of sarcasm and optimism. The duo work with subject matter that simultaneously integrates and celebrates contemporary life through sound, (Eg. Artificial Intelligence, Hot Desking). They produce scrappy yet melodic sound comparable to No wave. Previous gigs: MONO, Glasgow. GLAD cafe, Glasgow. GAS, Glasgow. The old hairdressers, Glasgow. Split tape launch 2ply and Taranchula See link below. (Label GLARC, Glasgow) Contact details: 2ply014577@gmail.com
